dmca.title: Cease & Desist for HentaiMoviePlanet.com
dmca.body:
From: David O [mailto:DavidO@rightstuf.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 01, 2005 10:25 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Cease & Desist for HentaiMoviePlanet.com
Importance: High



Dear ThePlanet.com:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named The Right Stuf International,
Inc.("IP Owner").  I have a good faith belief that the materials identified
in the addendum attached hereto are not authorized by the above IP Owner,
its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according
to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove
or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

I may be contacted at:

Shawne Kleckner

President

The Right Stuf, Inc.

PO Box 71309

Des Moines, IA 50325

        Email (correspondence)   <mailto:shawnek@rightstuf.com>
shawnek@rightstuf.com

        Email (general inquiries)*  <mailto:info@rightstuf.com>
info@rightstuf.com

Telephone       515-252-6116

Fax     515-252-0555

Truthfully,

Shawne Kleckner

Addendum to Notice of Infringement:

List of Allegedly Infringing Auction

Items Or Materials


Name of Intellectual Property Owner: The Right Stuf, Inc.

1)      Item/Materials 


        I) Intellectual Property Rights
